en: Dominique asked you to get a handle on your defensiveness, and that is exactly what you're going to do.

It takes some time. You read a few articles, skim a few books, and do a lot of journaling and soul-searching. Eventually you have a list of techniques and a deeper understanding of yourself, which you hope will help you take a step back and keep criticism from becoming personal.
However, the work of sorting through all that completely exhausts you and you lose a day of work.
